data.event: On May 2, 1896, U.S. Marines landed in Corinto to protect American interests during political unrest.
On January 25, 1922 the USS Galveston landed a detachment of U.S. Marines at Corinto, to reinforce the Managua legation guard during a period of political tension.

event.title: the Contra war against the Sandinista government in the 1980s

data.event: While supporting the Contra war against the Sandinista government in the 1980s, U.S. Forces mined the Port of Corinto.
On October 10, 1983, an attack destroyed 3.2 million US gallons (12,000 m3) of fuel.
